snippet.title: Zero Divide The Final Conflict (1997) IO Playthrough + Bonus Games (60 FPS) SEGA Saturn / iPlaySEGA
snippet.description:
Find me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/iPlaySEGA
Find me on Facebook: https://facebook.com/iPlaySEGA
Find me on Instagram: https://instagram.com/iPlaySEGAofficial

Welcome to iPLAY SEGA!! Episode 38

This Time: Zero Divide: The Final Conflict from 1997 by ZOOM.
It's the 3rd and final part of this 3D Robot fighting game.
Just like Virtua Fighter 2, Dead or Alive and Last Bronx etc. Zero Divide 3 runs in 'Highres' mode (480i) and looks amazing on SD TVs! This game has some nice hidden mini games like a SHMUP called 'Mini Phalanx'. I unlocked the hidden Cat/Neco character aswell, go to 29:00.

Thanks for watching!

©iPlaySEGA

#ZeroDivide #SegaSaturn #セガサターン
